General.Name: Hna-Caissa Travel Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Caissa Tosun Development Co.,Ltd. engages in travel and tourism related businesses in China and internationally. It operates through Tourism and Catering and food and beverage business segments. The company offers tourism and related services under Caesars Tongsheng, such as tourism, conferences, awards, and exhibition business, etc. It also involved in the aviation and railway catering business. The company was formerly known as Hna-Caissa Travel Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Caissa Tosun Development Co.,Ltd. in December 2019. Caissa Tosun Development Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Haikou, China.
